title: Leo Docherty – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Leo Docherty, the Conservative MP for Aldershot, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
Increasingly clear to me that there is only one person who can unite our country, lead our party and take the UK forward. I hope Boris Johnson will stand!
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
